        Sends the Status_Message HTTPS response
        Parameters:
        responseBody - the OutputStream object containing the response body
        exchange - the HttpExchange object required to send the response

      • generateMsgId

        private String generateMsgId()
        Generate a message ID (note this won't guarantee any uniqueness). We expect to convert to UUID when TAXII 1.1 is released.
        Returns:
        a string containing a random integer between 0 and 2,000,000,000
